messages.subject: Re:Birthdays
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/26/2002 4:53:56 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... This cracks me up. Yesterday in the mail I received a very sweet birthday card (with 20
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/26/2002 4:53:56 AM Eastern Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:


> As this day draws to a close......HAPPY BIRTHDAY
>
>
> I hope you had a wonderful, good day and that you have
> many more
>
> A very merry UnBirthday to everyone else too!!
>
>

This cracks me up. Yesterday in the mail I received a very sweet birthday
card (with 20 bucks!) from my partner's mother.

My birthday is in February.

Turns out, when talking to Beth, she realized that she hadn't remembered my
last birthday, so she sent a "Belated or early" card.

Strange, but very, very sweet.

Kathryn, whose PREVIOUS mil hates her to this day, and was the best thing she
lost in the divorce


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
